messages.subject: New "Japanese Entertaiment" Forum
messages.msgSnippet: I ve created a new Delphi groups forum for Japanese Entertainment that I thought people here might be interested in: http://forums.about.com/jtainment/start
messages.messageBody:
I've created a new Delphi groups forum for "Japanese Entertainment"
that I thought people here might be interested in:

http://forums.about.com/jtainment/start

It encompasses the entire range of Japanese entertainment from music
to movies to anime to games to jidai geki. I also have a Modern
Japan forum set up as well:

http://forums.delphiforums.com/mjapan/start

Drop by!
